WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I am using V1.3.1401.04. I created the Adobe Flash Player updates today and since Adobe provided the wrong download files I have to delete these updates and create new ones with the correct files.
I set the updates in the WSUS console to "Not approved" again, waited a bit, reconnected Package Publisher and tried to delete them there. But I got an error message, see attachment.
Does anyone have a solution/idea for that problem?
Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
docwaremf
WorkItem.Summary: Removal of update in Package Publisher not possible

Comments.Message:
First, pls. install the actual Version: http://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/releases/view/125901
Rightclick at the Update > decline. Now you can delete the update.
Awesome, worked, thank you very much!
